price: Sisi tumewakhusisha wao kwa sifa ya ukumbusho wa Akhera.
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumewakhusisha wao kwa sifa, nayo ni kuwa wanaikumbuka Nyumba ya Akhera, wao wanaikumbuka nao wanakumbukwa kwayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
